participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys socializing and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: A hobby of mine is the drums. I also enjoy cooking. I like listening to other rap music too. I like to go out to eat. One of my favorite artists is drake.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and fun-loving, enjoys music and gaming as a way to unwind.
participant_2.background: I am a musician. I like to play video games. I have been working the same job for two years. My favorite band is hop along.

content.text: I'm a musician. I play the drums.
That's cool! I'm a musician too. I play the guitar.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of music, but I mostly play indie rock.
I like indie rock too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I like Hop Along, The Mountain Goats, and The Menzingers.
I like Hop Along too! I've never heard of The Mountain Goats or The Menzingers. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're both really good bands.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, go out to eat, and hang out with friends.
I like to do those things too! I also like to cook.
I like cooking too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of things, but my favorite thing to cook is probably pasta.
Pasta is my favorite too! I love making homemade pasta.
Me too! It's so much better than store-bought pasta.
I know, right? It's so easy to make too.
Yeah, it's really easy. I'm glad we have something in common.
